scripts.storybook: echo 'Starting storybook' && npm run addon:build && cross-env VITE_CJS_TRACE=true  storybook dev -p 6018 --no-open
scripts.storybook:watch: cross-env VITE_CJS_TRACE=true nodemon --delay 5000ms --watch ./package.json --watch ./.storybook --watch ../addon --exec "npm run storybook" --ext ts,tsx,js,jsx,json --ignore **/dist/ --ignore **/coverage/ --ignore **/node_modules/ --ignore **/*.test.*
